content: There’s an awful lot of uncritical gushing approval for this article. Surely one must have a few reservations, particularly about “Stop learning by listening, start learning by talking” and “Stop learning by reading, start learning by writing.” Dear me, the person who teaches himself and does all the talking is taught by a poor teacher and is never listening to or receptive to external wisdom or experience, and the idea of “stopping learning by reading” is just so awful I can’t quite express my disapproval fully enough.
